page.title: 12Recreation in Brenchley
page.content: People today have much more time than in the past to devote to leisure and creative activies. In our area we have a{dancing school where children enjoy{ballet}classes,in the holidays teenagers learn{Scottish {dancing.}A group of ladies (aged about 3o_6o)attend{keep_fit}sessions. We also have{clay pidgeon shooting, {motor cycle scrambling,fishing and {horse riding,while gardening and {walking}are enjoyed by many. Some houses have a{tennis}court and an increasing number have{swimming}pools. A number of people enjoy sports and belong to clubs in the surrounding areas e.g. golf at Lamberhurst,tennis, badminton,squash,bowls at Brenchley. Some join the local Historical Society or a Womens Institute group. Adult Education classes are held in Paddock Wood,Tunbridge Wells and Tonbridge.
